snippet: Based on economic and market indicators, and a growing sense of public panic, top European Central Bank officials could easily justify a policy move at their regular monthly meeting Wednesday.
abstract: European Central Bank officials must decide whether to stand on principle at their monthly meeting and insist that political leaders take their turn at dealing with the euro zone crisis, or bend to market forces and a growing sense of public panic and cut the benchmark interest rate or grant more low-interest loans.
lead_paragraph: Based on economic and market indicators, and a growing sense of public panic, top European Central Bank officials could easily justify a policy move at their regular monthly meeting Wednesday.

headline.main: E.C.B. Under Pressure to Ride to the Euro's Rescue
